mapper.update: update user_screen set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar_url = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vip = #{vip,jdbcType=INTEGER}, crt_time = #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upd_time = #{updTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, crt_user = #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upd_user = #{updUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, nick_name, avatar_url, type, vip, crt_time, upd_time, crt_user, upd_user from user_screen where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, nick_name, avatar_url, type, vip, crt_time, upd_time, crt_user, upd_user from user_screen
